languages.text: "Историй у меня полно... Помню, на заре моей службы кто-то принялся травить еду на кухне. Никак мы отловить вредителя не могли, и пришла мне в голову идея: залезть в чан с протеиновой кашей и подкараулить паразита. Я маленькая была, худенькая, в чан залезла и сижу, жду по горло в каше. Долго сидела, но тут кто-то крышку поднимает. Вижу мужика не из кухонных слуг, в два раза больше меня и с мешочком какой-то дряни".

"Oh, the stories I could tell... I remember, in the early days of my time in service, someone started poisoning the food in the kitchen. We couldn't catch the vermin, so I came up with an idea to get into a vat of protein porridge and catch them unawares. I was a small and skinny little thing, so I climbed into the vat and sat there up to my neck in porridge. I waited a long time before someone lifted the lid. It wasn't one of the kitchen servants, but a man twice my size, carrying a bag of foul-smelling stuff!"
languages.original_text: "Историй у меня полно... Помню, на заре моей службы кто-то принялся травить еду на кухне. Никак мы отловить вредителя не могли, и пришла мне в голову идея: залезть в чан с протеиновой кашей и подкараулить паразита. Я маленькая была, худенькая, в чан залезла и сижу, жду по горло в каше. Долго сидела, но тут кто-то крышку поднимает. Вижу мужика не из кухонных слуг, в два раза больше меня и с мешочком какой-то дряни".

traits.locale_text: "Oh, the stories I could tell... I remember in the early days of my time in service, someone started poisoning the food in the kitchen. We could not catch the vermin, so I came up with an idea to get into a vat of protein porridge and catch the parasite unawares. I was a small and skinny little thing, so I climbed into the vat and sat there up to my neck in porridge. I stayed there for a long time before someone lifted the lid. It was not one of the kitchen servants but a man twice my size, carrying a bag of foul-smelling stuff!"

languages.text: "Oh, ich könnte Geschichten erzählen ... Ich weiß noch, in den Anfangstagen meines Dienstes hat jemand das Essen in der Küche vergiftet. Wir konnten den Täter nicht erwischen, also habe ich vorgeschlagen, in ein Fass mit Proteinhaferbrei zu steigen und ihn auf frischer Tat zu ertappen. Ich war damals klein und dünn, bin also reingeklettert und saß dann bis zum Hals in Haferbrei. Ich musste lange warten, bis jemand den Deckel anhob. Es war niemand vom Küchenpersonal, sondern ein Mann, doppelt so groß wie ich, mit einem übel stinkenden Beutel!"
languages.original_text: "Oh, the stories I could tell... I remember, in the early days of my time in service, someone started poisoning the food in the kitchen. We couldn't catch the vermin, so I came up with an idea to get into a vat of protein porridge and catch them unawares. I was a small and skinny little thing, so I climbed into the vat and sat there up to my neck in porridge. I waited a long time before someone lifted the lid. It wasn't one of the kitchen servants, but a man twice my size, carrying a bag of foul-smelling stuff!"

traits.locale_text: "Oh, ich könnte Geschichten erzählen ... Ich weiß noch, in den Anfangstagen meines Dienstes hat jemand das Essen in der Küche vergiftet. Wir konnten den Täter nicht erwischen, also habe ich vorgeschlagen, in ein Fass mit Proteinhaferbrei zu steigen und ihn auf frischer Tat zu ertappen. Ich war damals klein und dünn, bin also reingeklettert und saß dann bis zum Hals in Haferbrei. Ich musste lange warten, bis jemand den Deckel anhob. Es war niemand vom Küchenpersonal, sondern ein Mann, doppelt so groß wie ich, mit einem übel stinkenden Beutel!"

languages.text: «Oh, la de historias que podría contar... Recuerdo que, en mis primeros días de servicio, alguien se dedicó a envenenar la comida en la cocina. No conseguíamos cazar a la alimaña, así que se me ocurrió la idea de meterme en una cuba de gachas de proteína para pillar al responsable con las manos en la masa. Por aquel entonces yo era bastante esmirriada, así que me introduje en la cuba y me quedé allí esperando, metida hasta el cuello en las gachas. Pasó mucho tiempo hasta que alguien levantó la tapa. ¡No era uno de los siervos de la cocina, sino un hombre el doble de grande que yo, y llevaba una saca llena de una sustancia nauseabunda!».
languages.original_text: "Oh, the stories I could tell... I remember, in the early days of my time in service, someone started poisoning the food in the kitchen. We couldn't catch the vermin, so I came up with an idea to get into a vat of protein porridge and catch them unawares. I was a small and skinny little thing, so I climbed into the vat and sat there up to my neck in porridge. I waited a long time before someone lifted the lid. It wasn't one of the kitchen servants, but a man twice my size, carrying a bag of foul-smelling stuff!"

traits.locale_text: «Oh, la de historias que podría contar... Recuerdo que, en mis primeros días de servicio, alguien se dedicó a envenenar la comida en la cocina. No conseguíamos cazar a la alimaña, así que se me ocurrió la idea de meterme en una cuba de gachas de proteína para pillar al responsable con las manos en la masa. Por aquel entonces yo era bastante esmirriada, así que me introduje en la cuba y me quedé allí esperando, metida hasta el cuello en las gachas. Pasó mucho tiempo hasta que alguien levantó la tapa. ¡No era uno de los siervos de la cocina, sino un hombre el doble de grande que yo, y llevaba una saca llena de una sustancia nauseabunda!».

languages.text: 「ああ、私が語れる話か…現役時代の最初の方、誰かが厨房で食べ物に毒を盛ったことを覚えている。その害虫を取り逃がして、プロテイン粥の桶の中に入り、不意打ちで捕まえることを思いついたんだ。私は小柄でやせていたから、桶の中に入り、首までお粥に浸かって座っていた。長い間待っていると、誰かが蓋を開けたよ。そいつは厨房の使用人の誰かではなかった。私の倍の大きさの男が、悪臭のする袋を持ってそこにいたんだ！」
languages.original_text: "Oh, the stories I could tell... I remember, in the early days of my time in service, someone started poisoning the food in the kitchen. We couldn't catch the vermin, so I came up with an idea to get into a vat of protein porridge and catch them unawares. I was a small and skinny little thing, so I climbed into the vat and sat there up to my neck in porridge. I waited a long time before someone lifted the lid. It wasn't one of the kitchen servants, but a man twice my size, carrying a bag of foul-smelling stuff!"

traits.locale_text: 「ああ、私が語れる話か…現役時代の最初の方、誰かが厨房で食べ物に毒を盛ったことを覚えている。その害虫を取り逃がして、プロテイン粥の桶の中に入り、不意打ちで捕まえることを思いついたんだ。私は小柄でやせていたから、桶の中に入り、首までお粥に浸かって座っていた。長い間待っていると、誰かが蓋を開けたよ。そいつは厨房の使用人の誰かではなかった。私の倍の大きさの男が、悪臭のする袋を持ってそこにいたんだ！」

languages.text: “噢，我还记得什么故事呢……我记得我刚刚开始工作不久，有人在厨房的食物里面下毒。我们抓不到那个投毒分子，于是我想了个主意：让人钻到一大桶蛋白粥里，趁犯人毫无防备的时候进行抓捕。那个时候，我又瘦又小，于是我钻进了大缸里，坐在没过脖子的粥里。我等了很久很久，终于等到有人打开了盖子。那个人不是厨房的佣人，而是个比我高一倍的家伙，手里拎着一袋臭气熏天的东西。”
languages.original_text: "Oh, the stories I could tell... I remember, in the early days of my time in service, someone started poisoning the food in the kitchen. We couldn't catch the vermin, so I came up with an idea to get into a vat of protein porridge and catch them unawares. I was a small and skinny little thing, so I climbed into the vat and sat there up to my neck in porridge. I waited a long time before someone lifted the lid. It wasn't one of the kitchen servants, but a man twice my size, carrying a bag of foul-smelling stuff!"

traits.locale_text: “噢，我还记得什么故事呢……我记得我刚刚开始工作不久，有人在厨房的食物里面下毒。我们抓不到那个投毒分子，于是我想了个主意：让人钻到一大桶蛋白粥里，趁犯人毫无防备的时候进行抓捕。那个时候，我又瘦又小，于是我钻进了大缸里，坐在没过脖子的粥里。我等了很久很久，终于等到有人打开了盖子。那个人不是厨房的佣人，而是个比我高一倍的家伙，手里拎着一袋臭气熏天的东西。”

languages.text: « Vous n'imaginez pas tout ce que j'ai pu faire... Je me souviens par exemple qu'un empoisonneur sévissait dans les cuisines au tout début de ma carrière. Nous n'arrivions pas attraper cette vermine, alors j'ai eu l'idée de me cacher dans une cuve de gruau protéiné pour le prendre par surprise. J'étais alors aussi petite que maigre. Je suis donc montée dans la cuve et je m'y suis assise avec du gruau jusqu'au cou. Et j'ai attendu longtemps avant que quelqu'un ne soulève le couvercle. Au final, ce n'était pas l'un des serviteurs des cuisines, mais un homme faisant deux fois ma taille avec un sac rempli de produits nauséabonds ! »
languages.original_text: "Oh, the stories I could tell... I remember, in the early days of my time in service, someone started poisoning the food in the kitchen. We couldn't catch the vermin, so I came up with an idea to get into a vat of protein porridge and catch them unawares. I was a small and skinny little thing, so I climbed into the vat and sat there up to my neck in porridge. I waited a long time before someone lifted the lid. It wasn't one of the kitchen servants, but a man twice my size, carrying a bag of foul-smelling stuff!"

traits.locale_text: « Vous n'imaginez pas tout ce que j'ai pu faire... Je me souviens par exemple qu'un empoisonneur sévissait dans les cuisines au tout début de ma carrière. Nous n'arrivions pas attraper cette vermine, alors j'ai eu l'idée de me cacher dans une cuve de gruau protéiné pour le prendre par surprise. J'étais alors aussi petite que maigre. Je suis donc montée dans la cuve et je m'y suis assise avec du gruau jusqu'au cou. Et j'ai attendu longtemps avant que quelqu'un ne soulève le couvercle. Au final, ce n'était pas l'un des serviteurs des cuisines, mais un homme faisant deux fois ma taille avec un sac rempli de produits nauséabonds ! »

languages.text: "Ah, anlatacak ne hikâyelerim var... Hizmete başladığım ilk zamanlarda birisinin mutfaktaki yiyecekleri zehirlediğini hatırlıyorum. O paraziti bir türlü yakalayamadık. Ben de protein lapası tankının içine girip onu gafil avlama fikrini ortaya sürdüm. Ufak tefek, cılız bir şeydim. Bu sayede tanka tırmanıp boğazıma kadar lapanın içinde oturdum. Kapağı birisi kaldırana kadar uzunca bir süre bekledim. Kapağı açan, mutfak hizmetkârlarından birisi değildi. Benim iki katım kadar bir adamdı. Kötü kokulu şeylerle dolu bir çuval taşıyordu!"
languages.original_text: "Oh, the stories I could tell... I remember, in the early days of my time in service, someone started poisoning the food in the kitchen. We couldn't catch the vermin, so I came up with an idea to get into a vat of protein porridge and catch them unawares. I was a small and skinny little thing, so I climbed into the vat and sat there up to my neck in porridge. I waited a long time before someone lifted the lid. It wasn't one of the kitchen servants, but a man twice my size, carrying a bag of foul-smelling stuff!"
